name: Blox 3D World
description:
Create beautiful worlds with simple clicks, from giant windmills to craggy castles and add animals,humans and birds for an amazing creative experience.
Add blocks,animated props,trees, buildings and animals with different weather and lighting conditions easily.

Change colors of blocks, add animated props and watch as your world comes alive.

"Walk" Mode lets you create a character and walk around the world ,with the ability to customize your character with different costumes and colors.
Library lets you discover creations from around the world, with thousands of downloadable worlds and creations.
This game is like a toy. A super fun toy with a surprising amount of depth. No goals, no distractions, just a beautiful visual and audio experience with tons creative potential. You can also export your creations as .txt files, and import them as well.


The ultimate sandbox experience for kids and adults alike, with relaxing gameplay and millions of possibilities.
Voxel based environments allow for thousands of blocks to be created without any lag or performance issues.


FEATURES:
*Designed for a relaxed creativite experience with hours of world building fun.
*The world can be as simple as a deserted island or a teeming city...sky's the limit.
*Control the lighting to change time of day or setting with night,day,snow, swamp and evening settings.
*No goals, scoring or virtual currency....just pure creative fun.
*Animated animals ,windmills and people walking around and interacting makes an amazing miniature world.
*Share your world creations in the built-in web gallery with custom user names.
